validation_start: below are list of string for validation text
validation_password_text: This combination of email address and password is unknown.
onboarding_first_page_start: Below are list of strings for login
onboarding_first_page_description: You quit smoking, great! Quiddy helps you through difficult moments. Get help from buddies, think about your goal, or play a game. Together you can quit!
onboarding_second_page_start: Below are list of strings for login
onboarding_second_page_description: Quitting smoking together is more fun and easier! This app matches you with someone who finds the same moments difficult. Or who has the same goal. Who knows what else you have in common!
onboarding_third_page_start: Below are list of strings for login
onboarding_third_page_description: Everyone has difficult moments. Craving a cigarette? With the emergency button you can make direct contact with your stop buddies. Or with an advisor. You can also just play a game.
onboarding_fourth_page_start: Below are list of strings for login
onboarding_fourth_page_description: What's the best way to quit? How to deal with stress? This app gives you facts and tips.
account_info_start: Below are list of strings for login
account_info_description: Log in with your existing account or create one. Read more about how we handle your
registration_start: Below are list of strings for login
registration_description: Quitting smoking is always a good idea. Fill out the information below and create your account!
registration_checkbox1: I have read and agree to the terms of use and privacy statement
registration_checkbox2: My data may be used for scientific purposes (not required)
login_start: Below are list of strings for login
forgot_password_start: Below are list of strings for login
forgot_password_description: Enter your email address here to reset your password.
change_password_start: Below are list of strings for login
change_password_description: Enter your email address here to reset your password.
choice_gender_start: Below are list of strings for login

education_title: What education have you done or are you doing?

stop_motivation_date_title: What is your motivation to quit?

difficult_dont_smoke_title: What is your motivation to quit?
number_of_cigarettes_start: Below are list of strings for login
number_of_cigarettes_title: How many cigarettes did you smoke?
registration_complete_start: Below are list of strings for login
registration_complete_description: Would you like to know which buddy you will match? First answer the following questions!
username_start: Below are list of strings for login
username_description: Attention! This username is visible to your buddies and cannot be changed.
age_input_start: Below are list of strings for login
age_input_visible_text: Note: This app requires you to be 16 years of age or older.
cost_start: Below are list of strings for login
cost_title: What is the price of one pack of cigarettes or rolling tobacco?
dashboad_page_start: Below are list of strings for dashboard
dashboard_slogan_part_description: Hey! Nothing good comes easy! Be kind to yourself when the going gets tough.
dashboard_statistics_part_description_un: You haven't chosen an quit date yet! Add an quit date to see your stats!
dashboard_motivation_part_description: You have chosen the motivation [...]. Add an image to remind you of this! ðŸ˜‰
dashboard_view_part_third_listtile_title: A little dip? Check out the tips
chat_page_popup_start: Below are list of string for chat popup page
chat_page_popup_description: This chat is for talking and helping each other. In this chat:
chat_page_popup_listtile_first: Are we nice to each other.
chat_page_popup_listtile_second: Do we respect each other's privacy and do not ask for personal information.
chat_page_popup_listtile_third: You can stop the conversation if you want and without giving a reason. You can report inappropriate behavior.

chat_profile_slogan_text: This buddy doesn't have a bio yet

chat_unmatch_title: What is the reason you want to unmatch?

chat_newmatch_title: Are you ready for a new buddy?

per_pack_title: How many cigarettes are in a pack/roll out of a pack?

calander_stop_smoke_date_alert_title: Are you sure you want to change the stop date?
calander_stop_smoke_date_alert_descripti: Editing your quit date will reset your badges and stats.
chat_setting_start: Below are list of strings for calander chat setting
chat_setting_want_match_title: Let us know if you want to be matched
data_and_privacy_setting_start: Below are list of strings for data privacy
data_and_privacy_description: We would like to know which features of the app are frequently used so that we can continue to improve the app. Read more about them in the terms of use and privacy statement.
notification_setting_start: Below are list of strings for notification setting
notification_setting_description: Let us know which notifications you would like to receive
profile_page_start: Below are list of strings for profile page
profile_page_bio_description: Briefly tell us about yourself. This is visible to other users. So only share what they are allowed to know about you.
profile_bio_change_start: Below are list of strings for change profile bio
chat_blocked_start: Below are list of string for chat blocked page
chat_blocked_description_one: The chat has been blocked because we received reports of inappropriate behavior.
chat_blocked_description_two: Do you have any questions about this? Send a message to quiddy@trimbos.nl.
alarm_page_small_title: Distract yourself, get help from the Stopline or a buddy and think about your goal!
